description: Data was extracted from BCGSC (BC Genome Sciences Centre) on July 2016. mRNA expression was generated using the Illumina GA platform and processed through their RPKM pipeline.

fields.description: TCGA barcode identifier for the study participant, eg TCGA-02-0001
fields.name: ParticipantBarcode

fields.description: TCGA sample barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries
fields.name: SampleBarcode

fields.description: Letter code of the sample type using the TCGA standards, eg TPN, EBV. Full list available at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-TCGA-users/TCGA-code-tables/sample-type-codes
fields.name: SampleTypeLetterCode

fields.description: TCGA study abbreviation, eg LAML. Full list available at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-TCGA-users/TCGA-code-tables/TCGA-study-abbreviations
fields.name: Study

fields.description: Platform used to generate these data (IlluminaGA)
fields.name: Platform

fields.description: The gene symbol. In this table, gene_id is NCBI numeric gene identifier e.g. 276
fields.name: gene_id

fields.description: Gene symbol from the original data file, differs if the approved gene symbol has since changed, eg C11orf17 became AKIP1
fields.name: original_gene_symbol

fields.description: HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee gene symbol, based on gene_id in original data file, eg AMY1A. Null if no gene symbol could be found (see documentation for additional details regarding ETL) http://isb-cancer-genomics-cloud.readthedocs.io/en/latest/sections/data/data2/ETL_mRNAexpression.html
fields.name: HGNC_gene_symbol

fields.description: Reads Per Kilobase of transcript, per Million mapped reads (RPKM) is a normalized unit of transcript expression. It scales by transcript length to compensate for the fact that most RNA-seq protocols will generate more sequencing reads from longer RNA molecules.Examples: 0.0617, 14.9241, 2.2411
fields.name: RPKM
